title: Resort Style Pool and Spa, Dog Run, Private Patios and Balconies
posting_body: YES, WE ARE OPEN!
CALL NOW TO SCHEDULE AN IN-PERSON TOUR!
OR LET US SHOW YOU THROUGH FACETIME!
FIND LUXURY AT OUR GLENDALE, CA APARTMENTS FOR RENT  Get the walk-ability you love and the luxury you expect from your downtown Glendale, CA apartment home.
Explore a new studio, one, or two-bedroom apartment with a boutique ambiance that keeps pace with your busy lifestyle and uncompromising taste.
The Harrison is a friendly and intimate community offering a true sense of connection and a real chance to get to know your neighbors in a relaxed setting.
Old school inspiration meets a new school approach to life at these Glendale apartments for rent.
You’ll appreciate spacious and modern residences ideal for entertaining as well as relaxing.
Enjoy day to night amenities that include a rooftop terrace with incredible views of the city, onsite fully equipped fitness center, resort-inspired pool & spa, onsite CVS Pharmacy and much more.
A few steps from your door, discover major shopping and dining.
L.A.’s nightlife, culture, and the Studios are only a short drive away.
Contact us today to book a tour and discover your new haven at our Glendale, CA luxury Apartments.
Welcome to distinction on your terms.
Welcome to The Harrison!
Amenities Include:
Quartz Calacatta Nuvo Kitchen Countertops
